DOC.brief_summary: Objective : evaluate acupuncture effect inflammatory marker pediatric Otitis Media Effusion Methods : 100 Children otitis medium effusion ( OME ) diagnosis , watchful wait 3 month , randomize two group : acupuncture control . 50 Children acupuncture group receive standard treatment combined acupuncture 3 month . 50 Children control group receive standard treatment , time period . After 3 month , group reassess OME . Children improvement group assign tympanostomy . Data collection : child undergo tympanostomy , middle ear effusion ( MEE ) collect , analyze evaluate group difference .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Effect Inflammatory Markers Pediatric Otitis Media With Effusion : A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: otherwise healthy child age 28 year autoscopic OME diagnosis tympanometry type B conductive hearing impairment 30 decibel watchful wait treatment 3 month sign parental consent . lack parental consent know coagulopathy past tympanostomy regular intake steroid cytotoxic drug
